-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Elerea FRP wrapper for SDL
--   
--   This is an FRP wrapper for SDL using Elerea.
@package elerea-sdl
@version 0.1.1

module FRP.Elerea.SDL

-- | Main SDL event loop (with framerate)
--   
--   Produces an <a>infinite</a> list of network samples
sdlLoop :: Ticks -> (SignalGen p (Signal [Event]) -> SignalGen Ticks (Signal a)) -> IO [a]

-- | SDL Ticks
type Ticks = Word32
